snippet: Richard Gasquet faces teenager Borna Coric in the opening singles of the Davis Cup semifinal between injury-hit France and host Croatia on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet faces teenager Borna Coric in the opening singles of the Davis Cup semifinal between injury-hit France and host Croatia on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Frenchman Gasquet Faces Croatia's Coric in Davis Cup SFs
headline.main: Frenchman Gasquet Faces Croatia's Coric in Davis Cup SFs
